name: compliantly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you are willing to do what other people want you to do: The people lined up compliantly in the courtyard. Most visitors to the gallery compliantly follow the arrows.
in a way that obeys a set of rules: The new department was set up to ensure that the firm is conducting its business compliantly. We must make sure that all our members of staff are working compliantly.
More examplesFewer examplesWhy should we all compliantly do exactly what our leaders tell us to do?She has a rebellious spirit and will not step compliantly into the role her teachers have set out for her.The horse responded compliantly to every command I gave.
